text: The European Cup is an annual bandy club competition between teams from Europe. The first edition of the tournament was held in 1974. ==Winners== * 1974: SKA Sverdlovsk * 1975: Dynamo Moscow * 1976: Dynamo Moscow * 1977: Dinamo Alma-Ata * 1978: Dynamo Moscow * 1979: IF Boltic * 1980: Yenisey * 1981: IF Boltic * 1982: IF Boltic * 1983: Yenisey * 1984: IF Boltic * 1985: IF Boltic * 1986: Yenisey * 1987: Yenisey * 1988: Yenisey * 1989: Yenisey * 1990: Västerås SK * 1991: Vetlanda BK * 1992: Zorkiy * 1993: Västerås SK * 1994: Västerås SK * 1995: IF Boltic * 1996: Västerås SK * 1997: Sandvikens AIK * 1998: Västerås SK * 1999: not played * 2000: Sandvikens AIK * 2001: Yenisey * 2002: Vodnik * 2003: Vodnik * 2004: Vodnik * 2005: Edsbyns IF * 2006: Dynamo Moscow * 2007: Edsbyns IF * 2008: Dynamo Moscow * 2009: Dynamo Moscow ==Other websites== *Swedish bandy association - European Cup Category:1974 establishments in Europe Category:Bandy Category:Sports competitions
title: European Cup (bandy)
